page.title: 20LOCAL HISTORY IN SANDBACH
page.content: THE SANDBACH ALMSHOUSES WERE BUILT IN 1848 TO PROVIDE{HOUSING}FOR THE POOR OF THE TOWN.TODAY THEY STILL PROVIDE THE SAME SERVICE.{RESIDENTS}PAY A RENT OF Â£13:50 PER WEEK TO LIVE IN ONE OF THE 20 ALMSHOUSES. WHEN THEY WERE BUILT THEY HAD 2 BEDROOMS,A KITCHEN, A LIVING-ROOM AND A PANTRY. HOWEVER, BY 1984 THEY HAD FALLEN INTO A POOR STATE OF REPAIR AND WORK BEGAN ON{RESTORING} AND REFURBISHING THE ALMSHOUSES.THEY HAVE BEEN CONVERTED INTO 8 FLATS AND 12 HOUSES EACH WITH A BATHROOM, CENTRAL HEATING AND A MOBILE ALARM SYSTEM.THE ALMSHOUSES ARE RUN BY A{ {CHARITY}TRUST FUND WHICH HOPES TO PROVIDE 30 MORE RESIDENCES BEHIND THE ORIGINAL ALMSHOUSES IN THE NOT TOO DISTANT FUTURE.
